sections.text: brahma saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam| kśhatraṃ sandhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam| iśhaṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam| Urjaṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam| rayiṃ saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam| puśhTiṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam| prajAṃ saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam| paśUn thsaMdhattaM̍ tAnmE# jinvatam| | stutO&si̍ janadhAH|̍ dEvAstvA# śukrapAH praṇayantu|̍ | 1 (10)

suvIrA̱H prajAH prajanayan̍ parIhi|̍ śukraH śukraśOciśhA|̍ | stutO&si̍ janadhAH|̍ dEvAstvA# manthipAH praṇayantu|̍ | suprajAH prajAH prajanayan̍ parIhi|̍ manthI manthiśOciśhA|̍ | sajaMqgmAqnau diva A pRuthivyA&&yu̍H|̍ saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam| prAqṇaṃ saMdhattaM̍ taM mE# jinvatam| apAqnaṃ saMdhattaM̍ taM mE# jinvatam| 2 (10)

vyAqnaṃ saMdhattaM̍ taM mE# jinvatam| cakśhuH saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam| śrOtraṃq saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam| manaH saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam| vAcaṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam| | AyuH̍ stha AyurmE̍ dhattam| Ayur̍ yajñAya# dhattam| Ayur̍ yajñapatayE̍ dhattam| prAqṇaH sthaH̍ prAqṇaM mE# dhattam| prAqṇaM ~MyajñAya# dhattam| 3 (10)

prAqṇaM ~MyajñapatayE̍ dhattam| cakśhuH̍ sthaścakśhurmE̍ dhattam| cakśhur̍ yajñAya# dhattam| cakśhur̍ yajñapatayE̍ dhattam| śrOtraṅ# sthaH śrOtraM̍ mE dhattam| śrOtraM̍ ~MyajñAya# dhattam| śrOtraM̍ ~MyajñapatayE̍ dhattam| tau dEvau̍ śukrAmanthinau| kalpayataM̍ daivIrviśaH|̍ kalpayataM̍ mAnuśhIH|̍ 4 (10)

iśha-mUrjamasmAsu̍# dhattam| prAqṇAn paśuśhu|̍ prajAM mayi# ca yajamAnE̍ ca| | nirastaH̍ śaṇDaH|̍ nirastO̍ markaH|̍ | apanuttau̍ śaṇDAqmarkau# sahAmunA̱| | śukrasya# samidasi|̍ manthinaH̍ samidasi|̍ | sa prathamaH̍ saMkRutir̍ viśvakarmA|̍ sa prathamO̍ mitrO varuṇO̍ agniH ( )| sa prathamO̍ bRuhaspatiścikitvAn|̍ tasmAq indrAya̍ sutamAjuhOmi|̍ | 5 (12) (naya - ntvapAqnaṃ saMdhattaMq̍ taM mE# jinvataM - prAqṇaM ~MyajñAya# dhattaMq - mAnuśhIr̍ - agnir dvE ca)̍ (A1) (śpEcial kOrvai fOr Anuvakam 1 ) brahma# kśhatraM tat| iśhamUrjaṃ# rayiM puśhTiM̍ prajAM tAm| paśun tAn| sandhattaM̍ tat| prAqṇamapAqnaM̍ ~MvyAqnaM tam| cakśhuH śrOtraM manastat| vAcaM tAm| iśhAdipa~jcakE̍ vAcaM tAM mE̱| paśUn thsaMdhattaM̍ tAnmE̱| prAqṇAditritayE̍ taM mE̱| anyatra tanmE̱| ) 1. 1. 2 anuvAkaM 2 - athAgnyAdhAnaprakaraṇaM, tatra kAlaviśEśhavidhiH

kRuttikA-svagni-mAda̍dhIta|̍ EtadvA agnEr nakśhatram|̍ yat kRuttikAH|̍ svAyAmEvaina̍M̍ dEvatAyAmAqdhAya̍|̍ brahmavarcasI Bavati|̍ | muKaM ~MvA EtannakśhatrAṇAm|̍ yat kRuttikAH|̍ yaH kRuttikA-svagni-mA̍dhattE|̍ muKya# Eva Bavati|̍ | athO Kalu|̍ 6 (10)

agni-nakśhatramitya-pacAyanti|̍ gRuhAn. ha dAhukO̍ Bavati| | prajApatI̍ rOhiṇyA-magni-masRujata|̍ taM dEvA rOhiṇyA-mAda̍dhata|̍ tatO vai tE sarvAqn rOhAnarOhann|̍ tad-rOhiṇyai̍ rOhiṇitvam|̍ yO rOhiṇyA-magnimA̍dhattE|̍ RudhnOtyEva| sarvAqn rOhA̱n-rOhati| | dEvA vai BadrAH santO&gni-mAdhithsanta|̍ 7 (10)

tEśhAqmanAhitO̍ &gnirAsI̱t| athai̱ByO vAqmaM ~MvasvapA̱krAmat| tE punarvasvOrAda̍dhata|̍ tatO vai tAn vAqmaM ~MvasUpAvartata|̍ yaH purA BadraH saMpApIyAqn̍ thsyAt| sa punarvasvO-ragni-mAda̍dhIta|̍ punarEvaina̍M̍ ~MvAqmaM ~MvasUpAvartatE|̍ BadrO Bavati|̍ | yaH kAqmayEta̍ dAnakAmA̍ mE prajAH syuriti|̍ sa pUrvayOH̍ PalgunyO-ragni-mAda̍dhIta|̍ 8 (10)

aryamṇO vA Etannakśhatram|̍ yatpUrvE PalgunI|̍ aryamEti tamAhuryO̍ dadAti|̍ dAnakAmA̍ asmai prajA Bavanti|̍ | yaH kAqmayEta̍ BagI syAqmiti|̍ sa uttarayOH̍ PalgunyO-ragnimAda̍dhIta|̍ Bagasya̍ vA Etannakśhatram|̍ yaduttarE̍ PalgunI|̍ BagyEva̍ Bavati|̍ | kAqlaka~jjA vai nAmAsurA̍ Asann| 9 (10)

tE suvargAya̍# lOkAyAqgni-macinvata|̍ puruśha̍ iśhTakAq-mupA̍dadhAqt-puru̍śha̍ iśhTakAm|̍ sa indrO̱ brAhmaṇO bruvAṇa̍ iśhTakAqmupA̍dhatta|̍ EśhA mE# citrA nAmEti|̍ tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAprArOhann|̍ sa indra iśhTakAqmAvRu̍hat|̍ tE&vAkIryanta|̍ yE&vAkI̱ryanta|̍ ta UrṇAqvaBayO&Bavann|̍ dvAvudapatatAm|̍ 10 (10)

tau divyau śvAnAvaBavatAm|̍ yO BrAtRuvyavAqn̍ thsyAt| sa citrAyA-magni-mAda̍dhIta|̍ avakIryaiva BrAtRuvyAn|̍ OjO balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAqtman-dha̍ttE|̍ | vasantA̱ brAhmaṇO̱ &gnimAdadhIta|̍ vasantO vai brA̱hmaṇasyartuH| sva Evaina-mRutAvAqdhAya̍|̍ brahmavarcasI Bavati|̍ muKaM ~MvA EtadRutUnAm|̍ 11 (10)

yad-vasantaH|̍ yO vasantAq&gnimAdhattE|̍ muKya# Eva Bavati|̍ athO yOnimantamEvainaM̍ prajAtamAdha̍ttE|̍ grIśhmE rAjanya̍# AdadhIta|̍ grIśhmO vai rAjanya̍syartuH|̍ sva EvainamRutAvAqdhAya̍|̍ indriyAqvI Bavati|̍ śaradi vaiśya AdadhIta|̍ śaradvai vaiśyasyartuH|̍ 12 (10)

sva EvainamRutAvAqdhAya̍|̍ paśumAn Bavati|̍ | na pUrvayOH̍ PalgunyO-ragnimAda̍dhIta|̍ EśhA vai jaGanyA̍# rAtriH̍ saM~Mvathsarasya|̍ yatpUrvE PalgunI|̍ pRuśhTita Eva saM~MvathsarasyAq-gnimAqdhAya̍|̍ pApIyAn-Bavati|̍ uttarayOrAda̍dhIta|̍ EśhA vai prathamA̍ rAtriH̍ saM~Mvathsarasya|̍ yaduttarE̍ PalgunI̍ ( )| muKata Eva saM~MvathsarasyAq-gnimAqdhAya̍|̍ vasIyAn̍ Bavati| | athO Kalu|̍ yadaivainaM̍ ~Myajña upanamE̱t|̍ athAdadhIta|̍ saivAsyarddhiH|̍ | 13 (16) 1. 1. 3 anuvAkaM 3 - dEvayajanArthAH saMBArAH

uddhanti|̍ yadEvAsyA# amEddhyam| tadapa# hanti| | apO&vO̱kśhati śAntyai̱| | sikatAq̍ nivapati|̍ EtadvA agnEr vai̱śvAnarasya# rUpam| rUpEṇaiva vai̱śvAnaramava-rundhE|̍ | UśhAqn nivapati|̍ puśhTirvA EśhA prajananam|̍ yadUśhA̱H| 14 (10)

puśhTyAmEva̍ prajananE̍ &gnimAdhattE|̍ athO# saMqjñAna# Eva| saM jñAnaṅq hyEtat̍ paśUnAm|̍ yadUśhA̱H| | dyAvApRuthivI̍ sahAstA̱m| tE viyatI̍ abrUtAm|̍ astvEva nau# saha yajñiyamiti|̍ yadamuśhyA# yajñiyamAsI̱t| tadasyA-madadhAt|̍ ta UśhA# aBavann| 15 (10)

yadasyA yajñiyamAsI̱t| tadamuśhyA-madadhAt|̍ tadadaścandramasi̍ kRuśhṇam| UśhA̱nnivapannadO̍ ddhyAyEt|̍ dyAvApRuthivyOrEva̍ yajñiyE-&gnimAdhattE|̍ | agnirdEvEByO nilAyata|̍ AqKU rUpaM kRutvA| sa pRuthivIM̍ prAviśat|̍ sa UtIH kurvAqṇaH̍ pRuthivImanu̍ samacarat|̍ tadAKukarIśha-ma̍Bavat|̍ 16 (10)

yadAKukarIśhaṃ̍ saBAMqrO̍ Bavati|̍ yadEvAsya tatra nyaktam|̍ tadEvAvarundhE|̍ | UrjaM ~MvA Etaṃ rasaM̍ pRuthivyA upadIkAq̍ uddihanti|̍ yad valmIka̱m| yad valmIkavapA̍ saBAMqrO̍ Bavati|̍ UrjamEva̍ rasaM̍ pRuthivyA avarundhE|̍ athO śrOtramEva|̍ śrOtraṅq hyEtat̍ pRuthivyAH|̍ yad valmIkaH|̍ | 17 (10)

abadhirO̍ Bavati| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | prajApatiH̍ prajA asRujata|̍ tAsAqmanna-mupA̱kśhIyata| tAByaH sUdamupa prABinat|̍ tatO vai tAsAqmannaM nAkśhIyata|̍ yasya sUdaH̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ nAsya# gRuhE&nnaM̍ kśhIyatE| | ApO vA idamagrE# salilamAsIt|̍ tEna# prajApatiraśrAmyat|̍ 18 (10)

kathamidaṅ syAqditi|̍ sO&paśyat̍ puśhkaraparṇaM tiśhThat|̍ sO&manyata|̍ asti vai tat| yasmin-nidamadhi̍ tiśhThatIti|̍ sa varAqhO̍ rUpaM kRutvOpanyamajjat|̍ sa pRuthivImadha̍ A̱rcCat| tasyA# upahatyOdamajjat|̍ tat puśhkaraparṇE̱̍ &prathayat| yadaprathayat|̍ 19 (10)

tat pRuthivyai̍ pRuthivitvam|̍ aBUdvA idamiti|̍ tadBUmyai# BUmitvam| tAM diśO&nu vAtaH samavahat|̍ tAṃ śarkarABiradRuṃ̍ hat| śaM ~Mvai nO&BUditi̍|̍ tacCarkarAṇAṃ̍ śarkaratvam| yad-varAqhavi̍hataṃ̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ asyAmEvA-CambaTkAramagni-mAdha̍ttE|̍ śarkarA̍ Bavanti dhRutyai̱| 20 (10)

athO# śatvAMya|̍ | sarEtA̍ agnirAqdhEya ityAhuH|̍ ApO varuṇasya̍ patnaya̍ Asann| tA agniraByaddhyAyat|̍ tAH samaBavat|̍ tasya rEtaH parA&patat|̍ taddhiraṇya-maBavat|̍ yaddhiraṇya-mupAsya̍ti|̍ sarEtasamEvAgni-mAdha̍ttE|̍ | puruśha̍ invai svAd-rEtasO̍ bIBathsata ityAhuH|̍ 21 (10)

uttarata upA̱syatya-bIBathsAyai|̍ | ati prayacCati|̍ ArtimEvAti̍ prayacCati|̍ | agnirdEvEByO nilAyata|̍ aśvO# rUpaM kRutvA| sO̱&śvatthE saM~Mvathsara-ma̍tiśhThat|̍ tadaśvatthasyA̱-śvatthatvam|̍ yadAśvatthaH̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ yadEvAsya tatra nyaktam|̍ tadEvAva-rundhE|̍ | 22 (10)

dEvA vA UrjaM ~MvyaBajanta|̍ tata# udumbara udatiśhThat|̍ UrgvA udumbara̍H|̍ yadaudumbaraH̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ UrjamEvAva̍-rundhE|̍ | tRutIyasyAmitO̍ divi sOma# AsIt| taM gAyatryAha̍rat|̍ tasya# parṇamacCidyata|̍ tatparṇO# &Bavat| tat parṇasya# parṇatvam| 23 (10)

yasya# parṇamayaH̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ sOmapIthamEvAva# rundhE| | dEvA vai brahmannavadanta|̍ tat parṇa upAśRuṇOt|̍ suśravAq vai nAma|̍ yat parṇamaya̍H̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ brahmavarcasamEvAva# rundhE| | prajApati-ragni-ma̍sRujata|̍ sO&biBEtpra̍ mA# dhakśhyatIti|̍ taṃ śamyA&śamayat|̍ 24 (10)

tacCamyai# śamitvam| yacCamImaya̍H̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ śAntyAq apradAhAya|̍ | agnEH sRuśhTasya# yataH| vika~gkataM̍ BA A̱rcCat| yad-vaika~gkataH̍ saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ BA EvAvarundhE|̍ | sahRudayO̍ &gnirAqdhEya ityAhuH|̍ marutO&dBiragni-matamayann|̍ tasya# tAqntasya hRudayamAcCi̍ndann̍ ( )| sA&śaniraBavat|̍ yadaśanihatasya̍ vRukśhasya# saMBAqrO Bavati|̍ sahRudaya-mEvAgni-mAdha̍ttE|̍ | 25 (13) (UśhA# - aBavan - naBavad - valmIkrO̱ - &śrAmya - daprathaya̍ - ddhRutyai# - bIBathsata ityAhu̍ - rundhE - parṇatva - maśamayada̍ - cCindaṅq strIṇi# ca) (A3) 1. 1. 4 anuvAkaM 4 - saMBArasaM~MyuktAyatanEśhu agnyAdhAnam

dvAqdaśasu# vikrAqmEśhvagnimAdadhIta|̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱H saM~MvathsaraH| saM~MvathsarA-dEvaina-mavaruddhyA-dha̍ttE|̍ | yad-dvAdaśasu̍# vikrAqmE-śhvAqdadhIta|̍ parimitamava̍rundhIta|̍ cakśhur̍ nimita AdadhIta|̍ iyad-dvAdaśa̍ vikrAqmA(3) iti|̍ parimitaM̍ caivAparimitaM̍ cAvarundhE|̍ | anRutaM̍ ~Mvai vAqcA vadati|̍ anRutaM̍ manasA̍ ddhyAyati| 26 (10)

cakśhur vai satyam| adrA(3)gityAha|̍ adaṛ̍ śamiti|̍ tath satyam| yaścakśhur-nimitE&gni-mA̍dhattE|̍ satya Evaina-mAdhattE|̍ | tasmAqdAhitAgnirnAnRu̍taM̍ ~MvadEt| nAsya# brAhmaṇO&nA̱śvAn gRuhE vasEt|̍ satyE hyasyAqgnirAhi̍taH|̍ | AqgnEyI vai rAtriH|̍ 27 (10)

AqgnEyAH paśavaH|̍ aindramahaH|̍ naktaM gAṛ hapatya-mAda̍dhAti|̍ paśUnEvAva-rundhE|̍ divA&&havanIya̱m|̍ indriyamEvA-varundhE|̍ | arddhOditE̍ sUrya# AhavanIya-mAdadhAti|̍ Etasmin vai lOkE prajApatiH̍ prajA asRujata|̍ prajA Eva tad-yajamAnaH̍ sRujatE| athO# BUtaM caiva BaviśhyaccA-va̍rundhE|̍ | 28 (10)

iDAq vai mAnavI̍ yajñAnUkAqśinyA̍sIt|̍ sA&śRuṇOt|̍ asurA̍ agnimAdadhata̍ iti|̍ tadagacCat|̍ ta AhavanIyamagra̍ Adadhata|̍ atha gAṛ hapatyam|̍ athA̱-nvAhArya-pacanam|̍ sA &bravIt|̍ pratIcyEśhAqṅq̍ śrIragAt|̍ BadrA BUtvA parABaviśhyantIti̍|̍ 29 (10)

yasyaiva-magnirAdhIyatE̱|̍ pratIcyasya̍ śrIrEti|̍ BadrO BUtvA parABavati|̍ | sA&śRuṇOt|̍ dEvA agni-mAdadhata̍ iti|̍ tadagacCat|̍ tE̱&nvAhArya-pacanamagra̍ Adadhata|̍ atha gAṛ hapatyam|̍ athAhavanIya̱m|̍ sA&bravIt|̍ 30 (10)

prAcyEśhAqṅq̍ śrIragAt|̍ BadrA BUtvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamE̱śhyanti| prajAM tu na vE̱thsyanta iti|̍ yasyaivamagni-rAdhIyatE̱|̍ prAcyasya̍ śrIrEti|̍ BadrO BUtvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti|̍ prajAM tu na vindatE|̍ | sA&bravIdiDAq̍ manu̱m| tathAq vA ahaM tavAqgni-mAdhA̱syAmi| yathAq pra prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair janiśhyasE̱|̍ 31 (10)

pratyasmin ~MlOkE sthAqsyasi|̍ aBi suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM jEśhyasIti|̍ gAṛ hapatyamagra̍ AdadhAt|̍ gAṛ hapatyaM̍ ~MvA anu# prajAH paśavaH prajAyantE|̍ gAṛ hapatyEnaivAsmai̱̍ prajAM paśUn prAjanayat|̍ athA̱-nvAhArya-pacanam|̍ tirya~g~gva̍ vA ayaM ~MlOkaH| asminnEva tEna# lOkE pratyatiśhThat|̍ athAhavanIya̱m|̍ tEnaiva suvargaM̍ ~MlOka-maByajayat|̍ 32 (10)

yasyaivamagni-rAdhIyatE̱|̍ pra prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair jAyatE|̍ pratyasmin ~MlOkE tiśhThati|̍ aBi suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM jayati|̍ | yasya vA ayathAdEvatamagni-rA̍dhIyatE̱|̍ A dEvatA̱ByO vRuścyatE| pApIyAn̍ Bavati| yasya# yathA dEvatam| na dEvatA̱Bya AvRuścyatE|̍ vasIyAn̍ Bavati ( )| 33 (10)

BRugUṇAqM̍ tvA&~ggirasAM̍ ~MvratapatE vratEnA-dadhAqmIti̍# BRugva~ggirasAqmAdaddhyAt|̍ AqdityAnA̱M tvA dEvAnA̱M ~MvratapatE vratEnAdadhAqmItyanyAsAqM̍ brAhmaṇInAM̍ prajAnA̱m| varuṇasya̍ tvAq rAjñO̱ vratapatE vratEnAdadhAqmIti̍ rAjñaH|̍ indrasya̍ tvEndriyEṇa# vratapatE vratEnAdadhAqmIti̍# rAjanyasya|̍ manO̱stvA grAmaṇyO̱ vratapatE vratEnAdadhAqmIti̍ vaiśyasya|̍ RuBUṇAM tvA# dEvAnA̱M ~MvratapatE vratEnAdadhAqmIti̍# rathakAqrasya|̍ yathAq dEvatamagni-rAdhIyatE|̍ na dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścyatE|̍ vasIyAn̍ Bavati| | 34 (9) 1. 1. 5 anuvAkaM 5 - tatra pavamAnahabIMśhi

prajApatir̍ vAqcaH satya-mapaśyat|̍ tEnAqgnimAdhatta|̍ tEna vai sa A̱rddhnOt| BUrBuvaH suvarityAha|̍ Etadvai vAqcaH satyam| ya EtEnAqgni-mAdhattE|̍ RuddhnOtyEva| athO# satyaprAśUrEva̍ Bavati|̍ athO ya EvaM ~MvidvAnaBicara̍ti|̍ stRuṇuta Evaina̱m| | 35 (10)

BUrityAha|̍ prajA Eva tad-yajamAnaH̍ sRujatE| Buva ityAha|̍ asminnEva lOkE prati# tiśhThati| suvarityAha|̍ suvarga Eva lOkE prati# tiśhThati| | triBirakśharair-gAṛ hapatya-mAda̍dhAti|̍ traya# imE lOkAH| EśhvEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkEśhu pratiśhThita-mAdha̍ttE|̍ sarvai̱H pa~jcaBi-rAhavanIya̱m|̍ 36 (10)

suvargAya vA Eśha lOkAyAdhIyatE|̍ yadAhavanIya̍H|̍ suvarga EvAsmai# lOkE vAqcaH satyaṃ sarvamApnOti|̍ | triBir gAṛ hapatya-mAda̍dhAti|̍ pa~jcaBi-rAhavanIya̱m|̍ aśhTau saMpadyantE|̍ aśhTAkśharA̍ gAyatrI| gAqyatrO̱&gniH| yAvAnEvAgniH|̍ tamAdhattE|̍ | 37 (10)

prajApatiH̍ prajA asRujata|̍ tA asmAth̍ sRuśhTAH parAcIrAyann|̍ tAByO jyOti-rudagRuhṇAt|̍ taM jyOtiH paśyantIH̍ prajA aBisamAvartanta|̍ uparIvAqgni-mudgRu̍hṇIyA-duddharann̍|̍ jyOtirEva̍ paśyantIH̍ prajA yajamAna-maBi-samAva̍rtantE|̍ | prajApatErakśhya̍śvayat|̍ tat parA&patat|̍ tadaśvO&Bavat|̍ tadaśvasyA-śvatvam|̍ 38 (10)

Eśha vai prajApatiH|̍ yadagniH| prAqjAqpatyO&śvaH|̍ yadaśvaM̍ purastAqnnayati|̍ svamEva cakśhuH paśyan̍ prajApati-ranUdE̍ti|̍ | vajrI vA EśhaH| yadaśvaH|̍ yadaśvaM̍ purastAqnnayati|̍ jAqtAnEva BrAtRuvyAqn̍ praṇudatE|̍ | punarAvartayati|̍ 39 (10)

janiśhyamAṇAnEva̍ pratinudatE|̍ | nyAhavanIyO̍ gAṛ hapatya-makAmayata|̍ ni gAṛ hapatya̍ AhavanIya̱m| tau viBAjaM nAśaknOt|̍ sOśvaH̍ pUrvavAD-BUtvA| prA~jcaM pUrvamudavahat|̍ tat pU̱rvavAhaH̍ pUrvavAqT-tvam| yadaśvaM̍ purastAqnnayati|̍ viBaktirEvaina̍yOssA|̍ athO nAnAvIryAvEvainau̍# kurutE| | 40 (10)

yaduparyupari̍ śirO harE̱t| prAqṇAn vicCindyAt|̍ adhO&dhaH̍ śirO# harati| prAqṇAnA̱M gOpIthAya|̍ | iyatyagrE# harati| athEyatyathEyati|̍ traya# imE lOkAH| EśhvEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkEśhu pratiśhThitamA-dha̍ttE|̍ | prajApati-ragni-ma̍sRujata|̍ sO&biBEtpra̍ mA# dhakśhyatIti|̍ 41 (10)

tasya# trEdhA mahimAnaM̍ ~Mvyauhat|̍ śAntyAq apradAhAya|̍ yat-trEdhA&gni-rAdhIyatE̱|̍ mahimAnamEvAsya̍ tad-vyUhati|̍ śAntyAq apradAhAya|̍ | punarAvartayati|̍ mahimAnamEvAsya̍ sandadhAti|̍ | paśurvA EśhaH| yadaśvaH|̍ Eśha rudraH| 42 (10)

yadagniH| yadaśvasya̍ padE̱&gni-mAdaddhyAt|̍ rudrAya# paśU-napidaddhyAt|̍ apaśur yajamAnaH̍ syAt| yaM nAkramayE̱t| anavaruddhA̍ asya paśavaH̍ syuH| pAqrśvata AkramayEt|̍ yathA &&hitasyAqgnE-ra~ggA̍rA̍ aByavavartErann|̍ avaruddhA̍ asya paśavO Bavanti|̍ na rudrAyApidadhAti|̍ | 43 (10)

dEvAqsurAH saM~MyattA̍ Asann| tE dEvA vijaya-mu̍payanta̍H|̍ agnau vAqmaM ~Mvasu saM nyadadhata|̍ idamu# nO Baviśhyati| yadi# nO jEśhyantIti|̍ tadagnirnOth-sahamaśaknOt|̍ tat-trEdhA vinyadadhAt|̍ paśuśhu tRutIyam|̍ aPsu tRutIyam|̍ AqdityE tRutIyam|̍ 45 (10)

tad-dEvA vijitya|̍ punaravAruruthsanta|̍ tE̱&gnayE pavamAnAya̍ purODAśa-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ niravapann|̍ paśavO vA agniH pavamAnaH|̍ yadEva paśuśhvAsI̱t| tat-tEnAvArundhata|̍ tE̱&gnayE# pAvakAya|̍ ApO vA agniH pAvakaH|̍ yadEvAPsvAsI̱t| tat-tEnAvArundhata|̍ 46 (10)

tE̱&gnayE śucayE|̍ asau vA AdityO̱&gniH̍ śuciH|̍ yadEvAditya AsI̱t| tat-tEnAvArundhata|̍ | brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| tanuvO vAvaitA agnyAqdhEya̍sya|̍ AqgnEyO vA aśhTAkapAlO̍ &gnyAqdhEyamiti|̍ yattaM nirvapE̱t| naitAni|̍ yathAq&&tmA syAt| 47 (10)

nA~ggAni|̍ tAqdRugEva tat| yadEtAni# nirvapE̱t| na tam| yathA&~ggAni̍ syuH| nAtmA| tAqdRugEva tat| uBayAni̍ sahanirupyAṇi|̍ yajñasya# sAtmatvAya|̍ | uBayaM ~MvA EtasyE̱ndriyaM ~MvIryamApyatE|̍ 48 (10)

yO̱&gnimAdhattE|̍ aindrAqgna-mEkAdaśakapAla-̍ manu nirvapEt|̍ AqdityaM carum| indrAqgnI vai dEvAnAq-mayAtayAmAnau|̍ yE Eva dEvatE ayAtayAmnI|̍ tAByAmEvAsmA̍# indriyaM ~MvIryamava̍-̍ rundhE| AqdityO Bavati|̍ iyaM ~MvA aditiH|̍ asyAmEva pratitiśhThati|̍ | dhEnvai vA Etad-rEtaH|̍ 49 (10)

yadAjya̱m| anaDuhastaṇDulAH|̍ mithunamEvAva-rundhE|̍ GRutE Bavati|̍ yajñasyAlU̱kśhAntatvAya| | catvAra# Aṛ śhEyAH prAś~janti|̍ diśAmEva jyOtiśhi̍ juhOti| | paśavO vA EtAni# havIṃśhi|̍ Eśha rudraH| yadagniH| 50 (10)

yathsadya EtAni# havIṃśhi# nirvapE̱t| rudrAya# paśUnapi# daddhyAt| apaśur-yajamAnaH̍ syAt| yannAnunirvapE̱t|̍ anavaruddhA̍ asya paśavaH̍ syuH| dvAqdaśasu rAtrIśhvanu nirvapEt|̍ saM~Mvathsara pratimAq̍ vai dvAdaśa̍ rAtrayaH|̍ saM~MvathsarEṇaivAsmai# rudraṃ śamayitvA|̍ paśUnava# rundhE| | yadEka-mEkamEtAni̍# havIṃśhi# nirvapE̱t| 51 (10)

yathAq trIṇyAqvapanAni̍ pUrayE̱t| tAqdRuktat| na prajananamucCiṃ̍śhEt|̍ EkaM̍ nirupya|̍ uttarE̍ samasyEt|̍ tRutIyamEvAsmai̍# lOkamucCiṃśhati̍ prajananAya|̍ taM prajayA# paśuBiranu prajAyatE|̍ athO# yajñasyaivaiśhA&BikrA̱ntiH| | rathacakraM pravartayati|̍ manuśhyarathEnaiva dEvarathaM̍ pratyavarOhati|̍ | 52 (10)

brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| hOtavya-magnihOtrAM(3)̍ nahOtavyA(3)miti̍|̍ yad-yajuśhA̍ juhuyAt| ayathApUrvamAhu̍tI̍ juhuyAt| yanna juhuyAt|̍ agniH parABavEt|̍ tUśhṇImEva hOtavya̱m|̍ yathAqpUrva-mAhutI̍ juhOti|̍ nAgniH parABavati|̍ | agnIdhE# dadAti| 53 (10)

agnimuKA-nEvartUn̍ prIṇAti|̍ upabaṛ haṇaM̍ dadAti| rUpAṇAqmava-ruddhyai|̍ aśvaM̍ brahmaṇE̱| indriyamEvAva-rundhE|̍ dhEnuṃ hOtrE̱| Aqśiśha# EvAvarundhE|̍ anaDvAha-maddhvaryavE̱|̍ vahnirvA anaDvAn|̍ vahniraddhvaryuH|̍ 54 (10)

vahninaiva̍ vahni# yajñasyAva-rundhE|̍ mithunau gAvau# dadAti| mithunasyAva-ruddhyai|̍ vAsO# dadAti| sarva dEvatyaM̍ ~Mvai vAsaH|̍ sarvA# Eva dEvatA̱H prIṇAti| A dvAdaśaByO̍# dadAti| dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱H saM~MvathsaraH| saM~Mvathsara Eva prati# tiśhThati| kAmamUrddhvaM̍ dEya̱m ( )| aparimitasyAva̍-ruddhyai|̍ | 55 (11) (AqdityE tRutIya̍ - maPsvAsIt tat tEnAvArundhata̍ - syA - dA̱pyatE - rEtO - &gni - rEkamEka̍ mEtAni# haviṃśhi# nirvapE̱t - pratyavarOhati̍ - dadAtya - ddhvaryur - dEya mEkaM̍ ca) (A6) 1. 1. 7 anuvAkaM 7 - AdhAnamantrAH

GarmaH śirastadayamagniH| saM priyaH̍ paśuBir̍ Buvat| CardistOkAya tanayAya̍ yacCa| | vAtaH̍ prAqṇastadayamagniH| saM priyaH̍ paśuBir̍ Buvat| svaditaM tOkAya tanayAya̍ pituM paca|̍ | prAcImanu# pradiśaM prEhi# vidvAn| agnEragnE̍ purO agnir̍ BavEha| viśvAq AśAq dIdyAnO̍ viBAhi|̍ UrjaM̍ nO dhEhi dvipadE catuśhpadE|̍ | 56 (10)

arkaścakśhu-stadasau sUryastadayamagniH| saMpriyaH̍ paśuBir̍ Buvat| yat tE# śukra śukraM ~MvarcaH̍ śukrA tanUH| śukraM jyOtirajasram|̍ tEna# mE dIdihi tEna tvA&&dadhE|̍ agninA̱&gnE brahmaṇA|̍ | AqnaśE vyAnaśE̍ sarvamAyur vyAnaśE|̍ | yE tE# agnE śivE tanuvau̱| virAT ca# svarAT ca|̍ tE mA viśatAqM̍ tE mA# jinvatAm| 57 (10)

yE tE# agnE śivE tanuvau̱| samrAT cABiBUśca̍|̍ tE mA viśatAqM̍ tE mA# jinvatAm| yE tE# agnE śivE tanuvau̱| viBUśca# pariBUśca|̍ tE mA viśatAqM̍ tE mA# jinvatAm| yE tE# agnE śivE tanuvau̱| praBvI ca praBUtiśca|̍ tE mA viśatAqM̍ tE mA# jinvatAm| yAstE# agnE śivAstanuvaH̍ ( )| tABistvA &&dadhE|̍ | yAstE# agnE GOrAstanuvaH|̍ tABiramuM̍ gacCa|̍ | 58 (13) 1. 1. 8 anuvAkaM 8 - EtadbrAhmaṇaM

imE vA EtE lOkA agnayaH|̍ tE yadavyAvRuttA̍ AdhIyErann|̍ śOcayEyur-yaja̍mAnam|̍ GarmaH śira iti gAṛ hapatya-mAda̍dhAti|̍ vAtaH̍ prAqṇa ityanvAhArya-paca̍nam|̍ arka-ścakśhurityA-havanIya̱m|̍ tEnaivainAqn vyAvartayati|̍ tathAq na śOcayanti̍ yajamAnam|̍ | rathantara-maBigAyatE̍ gAṛ hapatya̍ AdhIyamAnE|̍ rAthantarO̍ vA ayaM ~MlOkaH| 59 (10)

asminnEvainaM̍ ~MlOkE pratiśhThita-mAdha̍ttE|̍ vAqmadEvya-maBigAyata̍ uddhriyamAṇE|̍ antarikśhaM̍ ~Mvai vAmadEvyam|̍ antarikśha̍ EvainaM pratiśhThita-mAdha̍ttE|̍ athO śAntir vai vAmadEvyam|̍ śAqntamEvainaM̍ paśavyamuddha̍ratE|̍ bRuhadaBigAyata̍ AhavanIya# AdhIyamAnE|̍ bAṛ hatO̍ vA asau lOkaH| amuśhminnEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkE pratiśhThita-mAdha̍ttE|̍ | prajApati-ragni-ma̍sRujata|̍ 60 (10)

sO&śvO vArO# BUtvA parA~gait|̍ taM ~MvAravantIyE̍nAvArayata|̍ tad-vAravantIya̍sya̍ vAravantIyatvam| śyaitEna# śyEtI akuruta|̍ tacCyaitasya# śyaitatvam| yad-vAravantIya̍-maBigAya̍tE|̍ vAqrayitvaivainaM pratiśhThita-mAdha̍ttE|̍ śyaitEna# śyEtI kurutE|̍ | GarmaH śira iti gAṛ hapatya-mAda̍dhAti|̍ saśIṛ̍ śhAṇa-mEvaina-mAdhattE|̍ 61 (10)

upainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO namati|̍ | rudrO vA EśhaH| yadagniH| sa AdhIyamA̍na̍ IśvarO yajamAnasya̍ paśUn hiṃsitOH|̍ saM priyaH̍ paśuBir̍ BuvadityAha|̍ paśuBirEvainaṃq̍ saMpriyaM̍ karOti| paśUnA-mahiṃsAyai|̍ | CardistOkAya tanayAya̍ yacCEtyAha|̍ AqśiśhamEvaitA-mAśA̱stE|̍ | vAtaH̍ prAqṇa ityanvAhArya-paca̍nam|̍ 62 (10)

saprAṇa-mEvaina-mAdha̍ttE|̍ | svaditaM tOkAya tanayAya̍ pituM pacEtyAha|̍ annamEvAsmai̱̍ svadayati| | prAcImanu# pradiśaM prEhi# vidvAnityAha|̍ viBaktirEvaina̍yOssA|̍ athO nAnA# vIryAvEvainau# kurutE| | UrjaM̍ nO dhEhi dvipadE catuśhpada̍ ityAha|̍ AqśiśhamEvaitAmAśA̱stE|̍ | arka-ścakśhurityA-havanIya̱m|̍ arkO vai dEvAnAqmanna̱m| 63 (10)

annamEvAva̍# rundhE| | tEna# mE dIdihItyAha|̍ samindha̍ Evaina̱m| | AqnaśE vyAnaśa̍ iti trirudi~ggayati|̍ traya# imE lOkAH| EśhvEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkEśhu pratiśhThita-mAdha̍ttE|̍ | tat-tathAq na kAqrya̱m| vI~ggitama̍ pratiśhThita-mAda̍dhIta|̍ uddhRutyai-vAdhAyA-Bimantriya̍H|̍ avI̱~ggita-mEvainaM pratiśhThita-mAdha̍ttE̍ ( )| | virAT ca# svarAT ca yAstE# agnE śivAstanuva- stABistvA &&dadha̍ ityAha|̍ EtA vA agnEH śivAstanuvaH|̍ tABirEvainaṃq̍ samarddhayati|̍ | yAstE# agnE GOrAstanuva stABiramuM̍ gacCEti# brUyAqdyaM dviśhyAt| tABirEvainaM̍ parABAvayati|̍ | 64 (15) 1. 1. 9 anuvAkaM 9 - brahmaudanam

śamIgarBAdagniM manthati|̍ EśhA vA agnEr-yajñiyA# tanUH| tAmEvAsmai# janayati| | aditiH̍ putrakAmA|̍ sAqddhyEByO# dEvEByO̱ brahmaudana-mapacat|̍ tasyA# ucCEśhaṇa-madaduH|̍ tat prAś~jA̱t| sA rEtO&dhatta|̍ tasyai# dhAqtA cA̱ryamA cAjAyEtAm|̍ sA dvitIya-mapacat|̍ 65 (10)

tasyA# ucCEśhaṇa-madaduH|̍ tat prAś~jA̱t| sA rEtO&dhatta|̍ tasyai# mitraśca varuṇaścAjAyEtAm|̍ sA tRutIya-mapacat|̍ tasyA# ucCEśhaṇa-madaduH|̍ tat prAś~jA̱t| sA rEtO&dhatta|̍ tasyAq aṃśaśca̍ BagaścAjAyEtAm|̍ sA caturtha-ma̍pacat|̍ 66 (10)

tasyA# ucCEśhaṇa-madaduH|̍ tat prAś~jA̱t| sA rEtO&dhatta|̍ tasyAq indraśca̍ vivasvAṅścA-jAyEtAm|̍ brahmaudanaM pacati|̍ rEta# Eva tad-dadhAti|̍ | prAś~janti̍ brAhmaṇA Odanam|̍ | yadAjya-mucCiśhya̍tE|̍ tEna# samidhO&ByajyAdadhAti|̍ ucCEśhaṇAqdvA̍ aditI̍ rEtO&dhatta|̍ 67 (10)

ucCEśhaṇAdEva̍ tad-rEtO# dhattE| | asthi vA Etat| yath-samidhaH|̍ Etad-rEtaH|̍ yadAjya̱m| yadAjyEna̍ samidhO&ByajyAqdadhAti|̍ asthyEva tad-rEtasi̍ dadhAti| | tisra AdadhAti̍ mithunatvAya|̍ | iyatIr̍ Bavanti| prajApatinA̍ yajñamuKEna saMmitAH|̍ 68 (10)

iyatIr̍ Bavanti| yajñaparuśhAq saMmitAH|̍ iyatIr̍ Bavanti| EtAvadvai puruśhE̍ vIrya̱m| vIrya# saMmitAH| | AqrdrA Bavanti|̍ Aqrdramiva̍ hi rEtaH̍ sicyatE̱| | citriyasyAśvatthasyAda̍dhAti|̍ citramEva Bavati|̍ | GRutavatIBi-rAda̍dhAti|̍ 69 (10)

EtadvA agnEH priyaM dhAma|̍ yad-GRutam| priyEṇaivainaM dhAmnAq samarddhayati|̍ athO tEjasA|̍ | gAqyatrIBir-brAhmaṇasyAda̍ddhyAt|̍ gAqyatraCandAq̍ vai brA̱hmaṇaH| svasya CandasaH̍ pratyayanastvAya|̍ triśhTugBI-rAjanya̍sya|̍ triśhTup CandAq̍ vai rAjanya̍H|̍ svasya CandasaH̍ pratyayanastvAya|̍ 70 (10)

jagatIBir-vaiśya̍sya|̍ jagatI̍ CandAq vai vaiśyaH|̍ svasya CandasaH̍ pratyayanastvAya|̍ | taṃ saM~MvathsaraM̍ gOpAyEt|̍ saM~Mvathsaraṃ hi rEtO# hitaM ~MvarddhatE|̍ | yad-yEnaṃ̍ saM~MvathsarE nOpanamE̱t| samidhaH punarAdaddhyAt|̍ rEta# Eva taddhitaM ~MvarddhamAnamEti|̍ | na mAqṃqsa-maś~jIyAt|̍ na striyamupEyAt|̍ | 71 (10)

yan mAqṃqsa-maś~jIyAt|̍ yathstriya-mupEyAt|̍ nirvI̱ryaH syAt| nainamagni-rupa̍namEt|̍ | śva AdhAqsyamA̍nO̍ brahmaudanaM pacati|̍ AqdityA vA ita uttamAH̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyann|̍ tE vA itO yantaM pratinudantE|̍ EtE Kalu vAvAdityAH| yad-brA̱hmaṇAH| tairEva satvaM gacCati|̍ 72 (10)

nainaM pratinudantE|̍ | brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| kvA# saH| agniH kAqryaH|̍ yO̱&smai prajAM paśUn prajanayatIti̍|̍ śalkaistAṃ rAtrimagni-mi̍ndhIta|̍ tasmin-nupavyuśhamaraṇI̍ niśhTapEt|̍ yathaṛ̍ śhaBAya# vAśitA nyAvicCAqyati̍|̍ tAqdRugEva tat| | apOdUhya BasmAqgniM manthati|̍ 73 (10)

saiva sA&gnEH santatiH|̍ | taM mathitvA̍ prA~jcamuddharati|̍ saM~MvathsaramEva tad-rEtO# hitaM prajanayati|̍ | anAhita-stasyAqgni-rityA̍huH|̍ yaH samidhO&nAdhAyAqgni-mA̍dhatta̍ iti|̍ tAH saM~MvathsarE̍ purastAq-dAdaddhyAt|̍ saM~MvathsarAdEvaina-mavaruddhyA-dha̍ttE|̍ | yadi# saM~MvathsarE &nAdaddhyAt| dvAqdaśyA̱M purastAq-dAdaddhyAt|̍ saM~Mvathsara pratimAq̍ vai dvAdaśa̍ rAtrayaH̍ ( )| saM~MvathsaramEvAsyAhitA̍ Bavanti| | yadi# dvAdaśyA̱M nAdaddhyAt| tryahE purastAqdAdaddhyAt|̍ AhitA̍ EvAsya# Bavanti| | 74 (14) (dvitIyamapacac̍ - caturthamapaca̍ - daditI̍ rEtO&dhatta̍ - saMmitA̍ - GRutavatIBirAda̍dhAti̍ - rAjanyaH̍ svasya CandasaH̍ pratyayanastvA - yEyAd̍ - gacCati - manthati - rAtraya̍ ścatvAri# ca) (A9) 1. 1. 10 anuvAkaM 10 - pa~jcAgnyAdhAnam

prajApatiH̍ prajA asRujata|̍ sa riricAqnO̍&manyata|̍ sa tapO&tapyata|̍ sa Aqtman vIrya-mapaśyat|̍ tadavarddhata|̍ tadasmAqth-saha̍sOrddhva-ma̍sRujyata|̍ sA virADaBavat|̍ tAM dEvAsurA̍ vyagRuhṇata|̍ sO̱&bravIt prajApatiH|̍ mama vA EśhA| 75 (10)

dOhA# Eva yuśhmAkamiti|̍ | sA tataH prAcyudakrAmat|̍ tat prajApatiH̍ paryagRuhṇAt|̍ atharva̍ pituM mE# gOpAqyEti|̍ sA dvitIya-mudakrAmat|̍ tat prajApatiH̍ paryagRuhṇAt|̍ narya# prajAM mE# gOpAqyEti|̍ sA tRutIya-mudakrAmat|̍ tat prajApatiH̍ paryagRuhṇAt|̍ śaṅsya# paśUn mE# gOpAqyEti|̍ 76 (10)

tasmA̱d-varuṇa-praGAqsair yajamAnaH|̍ parivathsarIṇAṅ# svasti-mAśA̱sta ityAśAsIta|̍ yath sAkamEdhair-yaja̍tE|̍ candramasamEva̍ tadidAvathsara-mA̱pnOti|̍ tasmA̱th sAkamEdhair-yajamAnaH|̍ idAqvathsarIṇAṅ# svasti-mAśA̱sta ityAśAsIta|̍ | yat pitRu̍ yajñEna yajatE|̍ dEvAnEva tadanvavasyati|̍ | atha vA asya̍ vAqyuścA-nuvathsaraścA̍ prItAqvucCi̍śhyEtE|̍ yacCunAsIrIyE̍ṇa̍ yajatE|̍ 58 (10)
